price: Dize: "Invoco, apenas, a meu Senhor, e não associo ninguém a Ele."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
